name: Nick
body:
### About Me I am a student at Stony Brook University studying Computer Science and Applied Math. My interests of study include Big Data and High Performance Computing. I hope to solve interesting problems with applications in these fields either at a university level or working with a company. ### People I follow Bill Gates
Elon Musk
### Education Stony Brook University, Computer Science BS (May 2017)
Stony Brook University, Applied Math and Statistics BS (May 2017)
Stony Brook University, Computer Science MS (May 2018)
### Work Experience Research - Big Data Research
Internship - Software Development
### Languages Python
C
Java
SQL
### Libraries/Tools MPI
IBM DB2
### Skills Super Computing
Parallel Programming
RDBMS, NoSQL DB, Map Reduce DB
Operating Systems
### Awards University Scholar Deans list for 4 semesters. Eagle Scout ### Contact Linkedin - URL nick.contact@email.io
